name: Qi the Phoenix
description:
Oh no! Azure Forest has been invaded by the Metal Clan!

Only the Guardian of Elements can set this right and restore harmony.

Enter...

Qi the Phoenix

---

This is an early prototype of a PSX-style adventure platformer created in one month for Bird Jam. Despite being somewhat less than half-finished, I hope you enjoy playing it! Please leave any feedback (especially about the controls and movement) in the comments!

---

Hints & Tips:

  • The jump button can be held to perform a higher jump
  • You can still jump after falling off a ledge
  • Holding forward while gliding allows you to glide further
  • Fluttering grants a small upwards boost
  • Enemies can be defeated using fire breath or by charging
  • Your health is displayed by your golden feathers
  • There are 100 coins to collect, see if you can get them all!
